title: 18 Wheel of Steel - All in One
description:
Todos os 4 jogos da serie 18WoS, em um unico pacote

Com instalador em BR, pode escolher instalar somente um ou os quatro
todos completos, sem precisar do Cd, 
O jogo Hard Truck 18WoS, tem tradu&ccedil;&atilde;o completa
O jogo 18WoS Across America tem o patch 1.10, com tradu&ccedil;&atilde;o completa
O jogo 18WoS Pedal to Metal tem o patch 1.07, com tradu&ccedil;&atilde;o quase completa
O jogo 18WoS Convoy, tem tradu&ccedil;&atilde;o parcial

Aproveitem

All the 4 games of the it serializes 18WoS, in a single package  
  
With install in Portuguese BR, can choose to only install an or the four  
all complete ones, without needing of the Cd,   
The game Hard Truck 18WoS, has complete translation to Brazilian  
The game 18WoS Across Am&eacute;rica has the patch 1.10, with translation it completes to Brazilian  
The game 18WoS Pedal to Metal has the patch 1.07, with translation almost it completes to Brazilian  
The game 18WoS Convoy, has partial translation to Brazilian  
  
Take advantage
